content: this legal case took place in the municipal court of zadar and involved a coownership property case the apartment in question belongs to three parties zm mh and rj each with a 13 share the proposer zm wants to dissolve the coownership due to financial difficulties and attempted to reach a settlement with mh but was unsuccessful the proposal suggests dividing the coownership shares and settling any debts related to the apartment the court can either physically divide the property or sell it and distribute the proceeds among the coowners a construction expert has provided an opinion that the apartment can be divided into three separate units and the court will make a decision based on this information
